text: This is a ranking list of seasons of KBO League, divided into sections relating to the number of teams in the league and the season format: ; No. of Teams: * 1982–1985: 6 teams * 1986–1990: 7 teams * 1991–2012: 8 teams * 2013–2014: 9 teams * 2015–present: 10 teams ; Season format: From 1982 to 1988, the regular season was divided into two — a spring season and a fall season — with a first-half pennant winner and a latter-half pennant winner. In 1999–2000, the KBO had two divisions of four teams each — the Dream League and the Magic League.
